summary: Otis and Eddy are best friends and they make rap music together. Their friendship is tested after a record label offers them a lucrative deal.
cast: Sido|Bobby Tight|Milton Welsh|Tim Wilde|Florian Renner|Alpa Gun|Claudia Eisinger|Alwara Höfels|Tony D.|Haschim Elobied|Liquit Walker|Patrice Bouédibéla|Holger Speckhahn|Nora Neise|Jessica McIntyre|Timo Dierkes|Timo Jacobs|Sebastian Schwarz|Georg Brehmer|Martina Ysker|Christian Beermann|Winnie Böwe|Karl Däberitz|Doreen Steinert|Mario Barth|Michael Ziegler|Klaus Maeck|Christian Springer|Tino Knoche|Tobias von Schönermark|Imad Mardnli|Dj O'Kizz|Hasan Yildirim|Matthew Brown|Martin Schultz|Shröda Familie Berlin|Uwe Wichmann|Rose Wakesho|David Akinloye|Dennis Oestreich|Wencke Synak
title: Blutzbrüdaz
